article.title: ABACUS Awarded Kirtland Air Force Base C4 Services Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ABACUS Technology Corporation, Chevy Chase, Maryland, is being awarded an $8,714,564 firm fixed price, cost reimbursement contract for command, control, communications and computer services at Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico. Air Force Nuclear Weapons Center, Kirtland Air Force Base,Â is the contracting activity.
